title: Super Mom Saves the World
description: Transformed into a super hero by a bizarre cleaning accident, middle-aged single mother Birdie Lee is busy raising funds for a brand-new stadium and planning a wedding to the man of her dreams when she is confronted by an unknown enemy who wants her out of the picture for good. By the author of Confessions of Super Mom. Original. 35,000 first printing.
author: Melanie Lynne Hauser
